attributes.action: Ensure that any future election ballot papers have the option to vote for "None of the above" on them so we do not have to be accused of being apathetic voters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the current crop of MPs appearing to be self serving, shallow and totally out of touch with reality and the wishes of the people of this country, I propose that election papers have the option to vote for "None of the above".

There are very few current MPs of any party that I feel I have any respect for, or trust in, and therefore have no wish to vote for them. I do not want to be accused of being an apathetic non-voter and therefore would like this option in order to show my contempt at the way  Party  politics operates in this Country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
